THIS IS THE 1.5.0 version!

The Latest is 1.5.1! Which includes:
- Ham ‘Em High – 30 new levels
- New Golden Eggs. I would presume there are three: #18, #19 and the Super Bowl / Rio Golden Egg.
- The ability to switch into “windowed” mode from the main screen (click the settings icon under the “Play” button)
- A new and improved pause menu.
- Bug fixes


PLEASE ANYONE! UPLOAD THE LATEST VERSION!

For any that get this error:

"The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0150002). Click on OK to terminate the application."

I solved this by opening angrybirds.exe in the app 'Dependency walker'. This program said a couple of .dll's were missing.

I downloaded these and put them in the game directory. And low and behold, I spent the rest of the afternoon avoiding study by playing this terribly addictive game. Apparently it has something to do with winxp versions.

The dll's I needed were:

msjava.dll
msvcp90.dll
msvcr90.dll
msvcr100.dll
INETCOMM.DLL

Hope this helps. Now, I will make pork for dinner. B.T.W. Thanks for the upload.

it works perfect...

Rite think av worked it out guys. For the guys that are having problems with Xp Vista etc with the application side-by-side problem. I downloaded itunes for pc and it must be something to do with quicktime I think but the game works now on my Vista home basic x86. hope it works

I searched around and someone mentioned to reinstall the Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributables 2005, 2008 and 2010 to get this game to work.  I did that and still didn't work.

Someone else then mentioned that he fixed the same exact problem I have by installing itunes/quicktime so I did that and bam, now it works fine.
